channel.title: two on Erick Chacón
channel.description: Recent content in two on Erick Chacón

item.title: Home
item.description: I am a senior research associate in environmental data science at Lancaster University. I obtained my PhD degree in Statistics and Epidemiology at Lancaster University and later worked as a part-time lecturer in spatial statistics at Universidad Nacional de Ingeniería. My research focus at Data Science of the Natural Environment (DSNE) is to develop and use spatio-temporal methods to model environmental and health data.
